"...Ah, hello, <%me>.": "Got errands at the camp?"
"Heading inside?"
"No. Just sightseeing."

"No, I'm not here for
any particular reason."

"The ARKS of Stia are just
as busy as ever, aren't they?"

"They have been able to improve
their numbers and resources, though."

"Since their scope of activity extended
farther into Stia, they have that much more to do."

"But not a single one of
them has complained."

"Everyone has their own duties and
obligations, and it's kept morale high."
"I've seen something like this before..."
"You mean in the other regions?"
"...You mean Aelio Town?"

"There is that. ARKS in every region
are all similarly trying their best."

"But what I'm reminded most of
is everyone back in Aelio Town..."
"Indeed..."

"Aelio Town single-handedly undertook
defense of Aelio's \"fringes\"."

"The one region that was something of
a blind-spot for the ARKS in Central City."

"But, as you know, there
weren't many ARKS in Aelio Town."

"They made do with a small scouting party, maintained
their own equipment, gathered their own food..."

"They were busy working,
all day every day."

"All while never knowing
when DOLLS might attack them."

"When they were attacked at night,
they'd pull all-nighters in order to deal with it."

"Even in a situation like that, nobody
complained. Nobody was discontent."

"In fact, they rather
enjoyed their daily life..."

"They were all carrying out their duties,
though at the time I didn't know it."
"That's why I always try so hard now..."

"They all single-mindedly
dreamed of a peaceful life..."

"We stand here today, carrying
on those wishes of theirs."

"Seeing the ARKS of Stia
just reminded me all over again."
"...Sorry. I went on a bit of a tangent there."

"So much has happened since then,
so I can't help but think about it."

"About our journey up until now...
And about the journey ahead of us..."

"I'm going to try to sort out
my feelings for a bit longer."
"I'll... see you later."
